bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a yellow object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
